snippet: As he christens his new space in Los Angeles, he shares with T 10 of his cultural touchstones — including several artists he doesn’t represent but admires nonetheless.
abstract: As he christens his new space in Los Angeles, he shares with T 10 of his cultural touchstones — including several artists he doesn’t represent but admires nonetheless.

headline.main: 10 of the Gallerist David Kordansky's Top Cultural Influences
